description:
Light, quick drying and tough, all things you want in a great pair of mountain biking shorts.Constructed and shaped expressly for female riders.Pull-on design keeps things simple.Stretch material breathes wellDWR finish shakes off mud and light rain.Elastic waistband lays flat and works with pack waist beltsMid-length inseam offers more freedom than longer bike shorts.Internal snap loops hold Patagonia chamois in place (sold separately).Dual zippered pockets secure your phone and snacks.

        Sustainability






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade














                      Recycled content
name: Patagonia Tyrolean Bike Shorts - Women's
